title: SKULL AND BONES™ PREMIUM EDITION
description: Pre-order now to get the Highness of the High Sea Pack, which includes the Notoriety Garb and Coronation Firework. Premium Edition Includes: The Ballad of Bloody Bones Collection, two additional missions, digital soundtrack and artbook,* and a battle pass token. Enter the perilous paradise of Skull and Bones™, inspired by the Indian Ocean during the Golden Age of Piracy, as you overcome the odds and rise from an outcast to an infamous pirate. *Access the digital artbook and soundtrack upon game release on the official Skull and Bones website: https://skullandbonesgame.com/digital-artbook
notes: © 2022 Ubisoft Entertainment. All Rights Reserved. Skull and Bones, Ubisoft, and the Ubisoft logo are registered or unregistered trademarks of Ubisoft Entertainment in the US and/or other countries.
